author: Press
title: Karcher aims to floor exhibitors and visitors at the Hotel Show 2015
text:
(MENAFN Press) Karcher, the world leader in innovative cleaning technology solutions is set to participate in the 16thannual Hotel Show. This year's edition of the show for the hotel, restaurant, caf and foodservice industry will span across halls 2 “ 8 of the Dubai World Trade Centre from 28 “ 30 September 2015.

The Hotel Show now in its 16thyear, has been growing steadily since its inaugural event in 1999. This year's show is expected to outgrow the 12% growth recorded in last year's edition and attract more than 700 exhibitors, and 19,000 attendees from the hospitality industry. In addition to the regular hospitality related knowledge sharing sessions, two new programmes entitled the 'Design Theatre' and the TecSec Programme' focusing on architecture and interior design, and technology and security respectively are to be added to this year's edition.

Speaking on Karcher's participation at the event, Mr Sreekumar Panicker, head of UAE sales of Karcher ME, said, "There's no doubting the size and scale of this event, our presence here is imperative to our growth in this sector in the MENA and other regions." Further elaborating on Karcher's relevance to the hospitality industry, Mr Sreekumar commented on the "Absolute necessity for hygiene in cafs, restaurants, and other areas in hotels. Karcher's machines that do not use harmful chemicals can sanitize areas without contaminating any food or leaving harmful residues, and unpleasant odours, especially in common waiting areas."

Karcher will display its steam-generating vacuum cleaner, the SGV 8/5, which can be utilized for deep cleaning critical areas such as kitchens, and the spray-extraction cleaner Puzzi 30/4 for use on carpets and upholstery at the show. 
The Karcher stall can be found at booth 3D100 at the German Pavilion in Hall 3. 

About KÃ¤rcher GmbH & Co. KG 
Founded in 1935, the family-owned business is based in Winnenden, Germany and is the world's leading supplier of cleaning technology to the private, commercial and industrial sectors. The Middle East subsidiary opened its doors in 1998 and is located in Dubai. The Krcher product range includes high-pressure cleaners, vacuum cleaners, steam cleaners, window vacs, vacuum sweepers, scrubber driers, vehicle washing bays, drinking water and wastewater treatment systems, dry ice blasters, cleaning agents, garden and household pumps, watering systems and drinking water dispensers.
